name: Wimp Out
description:
iD Tech Campers, this project is not for you.  It will crash your computer and then we'll have to sacrifice a fidget spinner to bring the computer back.  

I have never been so fascinated and disgusted with one of my own projects.  This is a "game show" style party game where players create embarrassing challenges for each other. Scoring is dependent on the volume (cheering/ laughing) made by an audience.

It was an experiment for my system's design class to see if using audio input for scoring could make audience members feel as engaged in the game as the actual actors themselves.  It was actually fairly successful, and I plan on revisiting this project at some point.
